title: Relates to providing that public schools within #N.Y.#city are not open for regular classes on any primary election day
summary: Relates to providing that public schools within a city having a population of million or more are not open for regular classes with their students on any primary election day.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to providing that public schools within New York state are not open for regular classes with their students on any primary election day
